widgets.title: Complexity Assessment Algorithm
widgets.nrql: SELECT max(`Num Languages`)+max(`Unique Transactions`)+max(`SW Dependencies`) from complexity facet appName

widgets.title: Qualified Dependencies
widgets.nrql: FROM complexity select max(`Browser Dependencies`) as 'Browser Interfaces',max(`Database Dependencies`) as 'Databases',max(`SW Dependencies`) as 'Software Dependencies',max(`SW External Dependencies`) as 'External Dependencies'

widgets.title: Unique Transaction Types
widgets.nrql: FROM complexity select max(`Unique Transactions`) as 'Unique Transaction Types'

widgets.title: Languages Used
widgets.nrql: FROM complexity select max(`Num Languages`) as 'Num Programming Languages'
